REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to submitting and tracking complaints relating to housing conditions and making such information publicly available
Summary: Relates to submitting and tracking complaints relating to housing conditions and making such information publicly available.
LawCode: Add ยง20-a, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to submitting and tracking complaints relating to housing conditions and making such information publicly available
